name: rate
description:
Allows a user to rate a call after the call ends.
Ensure that you call this method after leaving a channel.

parameters.callId: The current call ID. You can get the call ID by calling getCallId.

parameters.rating: The rating of the call. The value is between 1 (lowest score) and 5 (highest score). If you set a value out of this range, the SDK returns the -2 (ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT) error.

parameters.description: (Optional) A description of the call. The string length should be less than 800 bytes.
